JournalEntry_Vanguard01_Entry01_desc:
12 March Y20 
We got word last night of raiders spotted south of the Range. Nothing new, but I told Claire to leave Fuzz and Grim in the garden to watch the goats, at least for the next few nights. She pouted, said who was gonna keep her warm if it got cold.
She sure knows how to take my mind off of the scary stuff.
Discarded Data Pad_desc: Pick it up to discover what information it contains.
JournalEntry_Vanguard01_Entry05_desc:
If you're reading this, we're being taken towards the old Needles metroplex... I don't want to find out what happens when we get there. I've been trying to slow them down by asking for lots of bathroom breaks, but I think they're on to me.
 We had a guy complain his leg hurt, and they took him off the wagon and we haven't seen him since.
Item_CrudeCudgel_desc: Gives a small amount of bonus damage to your basic attacks.
DestructibleVillageGate_desc:
The gate is locked, but appears quite rickety - and easily destroyed.
Health: 50
Item_DesertGarb_desc: Gives a small amount of bonus armor.
JournalEntry_Vanguard01_Entry08_desc: Hexa invented a new game called 'Do it or Get Stabbed', and it is SO MUCH FUN. Most of the stuff you can make someone do is more interesting than getting stabbed anyway.
Chicken_Item_desc: A chicken in a cage, who would want this?
JournalEntry_Vanguard01_Entry04_desc:
Bastards took Pinky, Margarita, and Beignet. I'll be damned if they take Croissant too. Tin-can-wearing bullies. NO ONE messes with my chickens. 
 - Colleen
JournalEntry_Vanguard01_Entry02_desc:
6 March Y20
 I don't know who lets Brian stay in charge of the radio. He'd wait 'til raiders were dangling him by his ankles before calling in the Resistance. 'They got more important stuff to do than worry 'bout your corn, Avery', I can just hear the excuses now.
JournalEntry_Vanguard01_Entry09_desc: Jingles is so smart. I told him my axe was getting covered in red stuff and wasn't very sharp anymore, and he says I should wrap it in razor wire and then it won't matter.
JournalEntry_Vanguard01_Entry06_desc:
<Italic> the screen is blood streaked</> My name is Monroe. I don't have a last name. I killed two of the monsters who killed Claire. To anyone reading this, I tried to be a good husband and a good farmer, and it was all taken from me. I can't get my revenge, so please 
 get it for me.
Bloody Data Pad_desc: Pick it up to discover what information it contains.
Item_HuntersHat_desc: Makes you better in almost every way.  Looks stylish too!
JournalEntry_Vanguard01_Entry03_desc: <Italic>half of the screen is smashed</> f he really knows that I <Italic>missing</> but maybe he does kno <Italic>missing</> not sure how I should tell him.
JournalEntry_Vanguard01_Entry07_desc: We caught Evan drinking propane again. Dude's let a looooot of fumes go to his head.
PassiveStacking_SigmaXCEModule_Item_desc: Restores 1 energy over 4 seconds per stack.

<Italic>Dried, bloody smears cover most of the faint writing, but you can just make out parts of it.</>
Rangers - 4
Raiders - 14

JournalEntry_Vanguard02_Entry01_desc: I must have walked some near 30 miles to get here. Now I'm at the damn gate and can't get inside. No water out here, not even guards. Just nothing. Gonna walk the perimeter to see if there's a way inside after I take a quick nap.
JournalEntry_Vanguard02_Entry10_desc: Gloris Greg stole my fav ax. He mean.

Health: 200

Health: 160

Primary structure. Used to receive gathered resources. Spread Shroud.
Health: 1500
Item_ToxiCola_desc: Use to restore both health and energy.
JournalEntry_Vanguard02_Entry09_desc: If you're reading this, wow I can't believe you managed to track us this far. Who am I kidding this is going right into one of those craters. But if somehow you are reading this, then I heard we're going to a beach. Doesn't sound like it'll be very relaxing for us. Fingers crossed this doesn't end up in a crater.
JournalEntry_Vanguard02_Entry04_desc:
<Bold>NEW</> <Italic>2117 Hyper-Rod</>
39.995 Cash or FedCoin deposit only
JournalEntry_Vanguard02_Entry03_desc:
13:03 - I'm not gonna tell people to pick it off, Craig. No pineapple. 
13:05 - Deb, I will literally give you money. PLZ. 
14:12 - Sorry just saw this. 
14:12 - Haha very funny.
JournalEntry_Vanguard02_Entry07_desc: I hate Glorus Gregg he suck
JournalEntry_Vanguard02_Entry02_desc: I wish I'd been here to save you. Couldn't find flowers, but I did my best to make the spot look okay. Sorry.
Item_GoldenToaster_desc: Broken tools are jammed into it, as if someone tried to pry their way inside for some strange reason.
JournalEntry_Vanguard02_Entry08_desc:
<Italic>A plastic card, its name worn off from sand and sun exposure, has a still-working, though faded, LED screen.</>
<Bold>2.4FC avail.</>
JournalEntry_Vanguard02_Entry05_desc: <Italic>There is a crude drawing of the building near where this note was found. On top of the building, a stick figure with what look to be flames coming out of its eyes and hands stands with the caption 'GLOREEUS GREEG'</>
JournalEntry_Vanguard03_Entry05_desc:
HAV-Park: 16:15 - Lemme know if you guys didn't finish leveling up btw. Okay, as you're both walking through the massive archway, Princess Cerulean, with your passive perception, you see an archer's bow peeking out from behind a pillar. What do you want to do?
HAV-Priyani: 16:20 - Do they look mean?
HAV-Park: 16:20 - Roll Insight.
***DICEBOT ROLLING***
***4***
HAV-Priyani: 16:21 - That's a 9 total.
HAV-Park: 16:21 - Ya the bow looks mean.
HAV-Davis: 16:22 Do I see it?
SentryPostGunner_desc:
Long-ranged turret with an area attack.
Health: 450
JournalEntry_Vanguard03_Entry06_desc:
HAV-Priyani: 20:01 - Ha! Your swordsmanship matches your penmanship, Captain Gralt - lacking.
HAV-Park: 20:02 - Roll Intimidation. U gotta beat a 15.
HAV-Davis: 20:02 - Can I give her the Help action?
HAV-Park: 20:03 - ok what do you do?
HAV-Davis: 20:05 - <Italic>Grundor stands behind Princess Cerulean and mimes cutting his throat. He mouths,</> You're dead, dude.
HAV-Park: 20:06 - lol ok Pri, you have advantage.
***DICEBOT ROLLING***
***1***
***20***
HAV-Davis: 20:06 - YESSSS HELL YESSSSS
HAV-Priyani: OMG HAHAHA
JournalEntry_Vanguard03_Entry09_desc:
If you're reading this, I'm the luckiest guy I know. Right now I'm definitely the UN-luckiest.
Of course I'd be on the first ship out of here. Idk where they're taking us. But they fed us pretty good here, so fingers crossed it's more of the same at the next place.
I'm keeping my chin up, so don't worry about me too much. I mean, do worry a little. I still want you to come rescue me.
Okay bye good luck!
SentryPostLancer_desc:
Short-ranged turret. Attacks bounce twice to nearby units.
Health: 570
JournalEntry_Vanguard03_Entry02_desc:
Can't believe they keep us out here. Like dogs. Sleep in the sand while they got walls? Hate them.
Not gonna be nice any more.
JournalEntry_Vanguard03_Entry03_desc:
HAV-Davis: 12:23 - <Italic>Grundor raises his axe above his head, ready to serve the killing blow.</>
HAV-Priyani: 12:23 - Grundor, wait! <Italic>Princess Cerulean holds her hand out, empathizing with the felled Dragon.</> It is bested. 
HAV-Park: 12:24 - Grundor, as you hold your axe aloft, its reflection shimmering with silvery blood in the eye of the massive beast, what do you do?
HAV-Priyani: 12:24 - Hang on guys, my patrol's coming up.
HAV-Davis: 12:24 - Aww k
HAV-Park: 12:25 - Damn ok we'll pick up there later.
JournalEntry_Vanguard03_Entry08_desc:
02 October 2103
I am Marcus. I 4 years ode. My birday tomoroh.
bye by!
Item_BattleJuice_desc: Use to gain a speed buff.  Will also make you feel warm and tingly.
Item_HerbalTea_desc: Use to restore a large amount of energy.
Item_SpareParts_desc: Use to repair a mechanical unit.
Item_BigRedButton_desc: Press it.  Or not.  What do YOU want to do?
JournalEntry_Vanguard03_Entry04_desc:
It's officially been long enough for sprouts to start growing. Thankfully the guards are giving us actual fruits and vegetables: I think I eat better than I do at home here! Anyway, all that seed scavenging paid off and my little garden boxes I made are so cute! Well, all things considered. 
My own little safe haven, out of sight of guards or the Punishment Wall.
Item_SandrunnerBoots_desc: Enables swift movement over any terrain.
JournalEntry_Vanguard03_Entry01_desc:
Probably shouldn't be typing this anywhere. Not that I think Galt cares about comms, but I bet HAV-NET is monitored.
But I had to get it off my chest: I hate this. I doesn't feel like the safest option anymore. Nothing feels safe. I shouldn't have left the Range but I did and I'm no better for it.
Certainly wouldn't be a good farmer. But I'm no good at raiding either. And I wouldn't be caught dead scavenging. What are my options???
JournalEntry_Vanguard04_Entry03_desc: Not sure why Sig-Four thought we were gonna need a bunch of Firestarters out here where everything is DEAD. But like Jerry said, we don't say no to mech suits so if we need them, they're here.
GreaterShrine_desc:
Upgrades to the Greater Shrine, unlocking more advanced units, structures, and upgrades. Enables the Shroudstone Manifestation Animus Ritual from the Top Panel. Permanently grants Infernal units 4% White Health regeneration per second on Shroud.
Health: 2500

Health: 300

Health: 200
Item_MedKit_desc: Use to restore health to a target unit and all nearby allies.
JournalEntry_Vanguard04_Entry02_desc: Take what you need. I counted all the rockets in here, and nobody needs more than like three rockets.

Health: 800

13 Dec 2117 14:52:36 <Bold>Sig-2 Station F</>
<Bold>User: </>HENDRIX, SAMANTHA
Synthesized Precipitation Study 13B commenced at 12:31:31 ST. 
Humidity 78%. 
5/5 Storm Pylons operational.  
Add'l note: Unusual cloud activity sweeping in from East. We'll probably need to isolate the surrounding area against winter storm +12NM to mitigate outlier data. 
<Bold>Findings: </>7cm precipitation w/69% saturation rate.

JournalEntry_Vanguard06_Entry06_desc:
31 Dec 2124 00:00:00 <Bold>Sig-2 Station ?</>
<Bold>User: </>GUEST
Capt. Jonston,
my team and I are in need of evac as soon as you get this. We're working to establish comms but I'm pretty sure that whatever EMP that Sig-6 Station set off has actually fried most of our units. We have about four weeks of MRE's and a backup solar charger for nanobots.
JournalEntry_Vanguard06_Entry07_desc:
31 Dec 2124 00:00:00 <Bold>Sig-2 Station ?</>
<Bold>User: </>GUEST
Half the team deserted today, looking for other facilities. Taking a remote deployment like this had its upsides, but I didn't know it meant we were abandoned when shit hit the fan. So screw you, Jonston.
*LOGOUT*
JournalEntry_Vanguard06_Entry05_desc:
31 Dec 2124 00:00:00 <Bold>Sig-2 Station ?</>
<Bold>User: </>GUEST
Sig-6 Station B didn't tell us ANYTHING, Jonston. Two Pylons BLOWN. I'm not taking the hit for this.
AttackButton_desc: Orders selected units to move to the target location, fighting enemies along the way. Targeting a unit will cause selected units to attack the target until it is destroyed.
StopButton_desc: Orders selected units to cancel all orders and stop moving. Stopped units will attack and move to engage nearby enemies.
HoldPositionButton_desc: Orders selected units to stay where they are and attack enemies within range. Units will neither chase down enemies nor move to engage.
MoveButton_desc: Orders selected units to move to the target location or follow the target unit. Moving units will not engage enemies.
PatrolButton_desc: Orders selected units to move between their current location and the target location, engaging enemies along the way.
PulseShield_Button_desc:
Reduces damage done to this unit by 50% for 10 seconds.

<Italic>Right-click to enable/disable autocasting.</>
WingedDash_Button_desc:
Increases this unit's movement speed by 100% and allows it to evade 50% of incoming attacks for 2 seconds.

<Italic>Right-click to enable/disable autocasting.</>
DisableTower_Button_desc: Disables all weapons, active abilities, and passive traits on a target enemy defensive structure for 30 seconds.
SeraphimCreepBonus_Button_desc:
Increases the damage of this unit's attack against Creeps by 200%.

<Italic>Right-click to enable/disable autocasting.</>
ImmobileAttack_Button_desc: Attacks a target unit until it is destroyed or moves out of range.
Salvage_Button_desc: Recovers 100% of this structure's resource cost.
CancelProduction_Button_desc: Cancels the last item in the production queue.
HarbingerStunUpgrade_Button_desc: Improves the <UnitName>Harbinger's</> <Bold>Descend</> ability, allowing it to stun surrounding enemy ground units for 1 second.
SalivaryOverflowUpgrade_Button_desc: Increases the maximum potency of <UnitName>Spriggan's</> <Bold>Binding Saliva</> from 30% reduction to 60%.
InhalePoisonUpgrade_Button_desc: Allows <UnitName>Flayed Dragons</> to use the <Bold>Inhale Poison</> ability.
MorphToSolarHabitat_Button_desc: Grants +5 supply. Allows this structure to use the Solar Charge ability.
MorphToRampart_Button_desc: Grants +5 supply. Allows this structure to use the Reinforce ability.
VanguardSuperEnergyUpgrade_Button_desc: Further increases <Bold>Orbital Calldown</> energy regeneration by 50%.
SuperWorkerOverchargeUpgrade_Button_desc: Increases the damage, armor, and construction speed bonuses given by <Bold>B.O.B. Overcharge</> by 100%.
Prowl_Button_desc: The Carnivex <Bold>Stealths</> itself at the cost of 20% movement speed reduction. It will leap at its next attack target, dealing an additional 60 damage over 4 seconds. Drains energy when the Carinvex moves.
ProwlExit_Button_desc: The Carnivex reveals itself, allowing it to move without draining energy.
ArgentChargedAttacks_Button_desc:
Imbues this unit's weapon, allowing it to deal 100% increased damage.

<Italic>Right-click to enable/disable autocasting.</>

NanoswarmUpgradeButton_desc: Increases the energy regeneration of <UnitName>MedTechs</> and allows them to use the <Bold>Nanoswarm</> ability.
RocketChargeUpgradeButton_desc: Increases the launch range of the <UnitName>Vulcan's</> <Bold>Jump Jets</> ability and allows it to deal 50 damage to and stun the first enemy unit it impacts for 3 seconds.
MorphCoreConstructSubmenu_Button_desc: A list of structures. Morph Cores can morph into Celestial structures outside of Cascade Field at a greatly increased build rate.
MorphToArcshipTier1_Button_desc:
Flying mobile structure. Used to receive gathered Therium. Projects Cascade Field around itself, and can use the Skyward Salvation ability, which heals friendly units out-of-combat.

Provides 30 Power.

<Highlight>Surged</>: Gains 50% increased movement speed and energy regeneration.
MorphToPowerBank_Button_desc:
Provides 15 Power. Can use Energize, which will restore energy to nearby friendly units and structures.

<Highlight>Surged:</> Gains 100% increased energy regeneration and Energize will recharge units 100% more quickly.
MorphToCreationChamber_Button_desc:
Robotics production structure. Produces core Celestial units.

Consumes 6 Power.

<Highlight>Surged:</> Units are trained 50% faster.
MorphToMainframe_Button_desc:
War-Machine production structure.

Consumes 6 Power.

<Highlight>Surged:</> Units are trained 50% faster and gain 25% increased attack and movement speed upon completion for 30 seconds.
MorphToBastion_Button_desc:
Biosynth production structure.

Consumes 6 Power.

<Highlight>Surged:</> Units are trained 50% faster and gain 25% increased attack and movement speed upon completion for 30 seconds.

Structure that greatly expands the <Bold>Cascade Field</>. Can be upgraded to one of two defensive structures.

Consumes 2 Power.

<Highlight>Surged:</> Gains <Bold>Detection</>.

<AttackCallout>Cannot Attack</>

Receives harvested Therium and upgrades Celestial faction-wide abilities.

Spawns with a Prism, which will automatically begin harvesting from the nearest Therium Node.

Consumes 4 Power.

<Highlight>Surged:</> Nearby friendly Prisms gain 50% increased movement speed.

Consumes 8 Power.

<Highlight>Surged:</> Nearby friendly structure gain +25 armor.

Upgrades War-Machines and Biosynths produced from the Starforge and Legion Hall.

Consumes 8 Power.

<Highlight>Surged:</> Nearby friendly units gain 20% increased damage.

Passively harvests 300 Luminite per minute from a target Luminite Mine. Up to 4 Prisms may harvest from the Mine at the same time.

Consumes 8 Power.

<Highlight>Surged:</> Nearby friendly Prisms gain +5 bonus health regeneration per second.

<Highlight>Surged</>: Gains 50% increased movement speed and energy regeneration.

<Highlight>Surged:</> Gains 100% increased energy regeneration and Energize will recharge units 100% more quickly.
CreationChamber_Button_desc:
Robotics production structure. Produces core Celestial units.

Consumes 6 Power.

<Highlight>Surged:</> Units are trained 50% faster.
Mainframe_Button_desc:
War-Machine production structure.

Consumes 6 Power.

<Highlight>Surged:</> Units are trained 50% faster and gain 25% increased attack and movement speed upon completion for 30 seconds.
Bastion_Button_desc:
Biosynth production structure.

Consumes 6 Power.

<Highlight>Surged:</> Units are trained 50% faster and gain 25% increased attack and movement speed upon completion for 30 seconds.

StickyBomb_Button_desc: Throws a bomb at a target ground unit or location. After 3 seconds, it will explode, dealing 50 damage to and leaving behind goop that slows all ground units in an area.
PhaseShift_Button_desc: Teleports to a nearby target location and <Bold>Stealths</>.
Infiltrate_Button_desc: Targets an enemy structure. After channeling for 5 seconds, the structure will be dealt 500 damage, disabled for 20 seconds, and revealed. 50 Luminite and 50 Therium will be stolen from the player, and the player's Top-Bar will be disabled if it is a Command Structure.
Harvest_Button_desc: Orders the worker to gather resources from a selected Luminite or Therium node.
HQTier1_Button_desc: Primary structure. Used to receive gathered resources.
Scrapyard_Button_desc: Receives gathered Therium and upgrades Vanguard faction-wide abilities.
SentryPost_Button_desc:
Defensive structure. Can load infantry units, which will alter its capabilities.

<Yellow>Attack Power:</> <Bold>Low</>
<Yellow>Durability:</> <Bold>High</> (Heavy Armor)
Repair_Button_desc: Restores health to mechanical units and structures.
CancelOrder_Button_desc: Cancels the current order and allows you to enter a new order.
ReturnResources_Button_desc: Returns carried resources to the nearest dropoff and resumes harvesting.
SummonFlayedDragon_Button_desc:
Summons a powerful enthralled dragon. Nearby enemy units that die while Infested will spawn an additional Fiend. Can use Fetid Breath, which Infests enemy units in an area.

<Yellow>Attack Power:</> <Bold>Very High</>
<Yellow>Durability:</> <Bold>Very High</> (Heavy Armor)
<Yellow>Mobility:</> <Bold>Fast</> (6.5 Movement Speed)
Vulcan_Button_desc:
Battle-mech with a powerful area attack effective against lightly armored units. Damage increases the longer the Vulcan is in battle. Can use Jump Jets.

<Yellow>Attack Power:</> <Bold>Very High</> (Bonus vs. Light)
<Yellow>Durability:</> <Bold>High</> (Heavy Armor)
<Yellow>Speed:</> <Bold>Slow</> (3.5 Movement Speed)
ArtilleryMech_Button_desc:
Artillery mech, adept at holding territory against masses of ground units and sieging enemy bases. Can Deploy to gain a powerful long-range area attack.

<Yellow>Attack Power:</> <Bold>High</> (Bonus vs. Heavy, Structure)
<Yellow>Durability:</> <Bold>High</> (Heavy Armor)
<Yellow>Speed:</> <Bold>Slow</> (3 Movement Speed)
CollectionArray_EnableCollection_Button_:
<Bold>Deploy:</> Enables harvesting from a target Luminite Mine, grounding the Collection Array.

Must be used on a Luminite Mine.
Battlebomber_Button_desc:
Slow-moving aerial bombardment ship. Can use Return to Hangar.

<Yellow>Attack Power:</> <Bold>Very High</>
<Yellow>Durability:</> <Bold>High</> (Heavy Armor)
<Yellow>Mobility:</> <Bold>Very Low</> (1.5 Movement Speed)
AeonDriftLoad_Button_desc: Loads a ground unit into into the Aeon Drift. Units that enter the Aeon Drift can enter exit from any Aeon Gate.
AeonDriftUnload_Button_desc: Unloads all units from the Aeon Drift.
FlameOnUpgrade_Button_desc: Allows <UnitName>Imps</> to use the <Bold>Flame On</> ability.
GauntPlagueAxeUpgrade_Button_desc:
Grants <UnitName>Gaunts</>:

<Bold>On-Hit:</> Attacked units are infected with <Bold>Infest</>.
GauntDeathAxeUpgrade_Button_desc: Increases the movement speed of <UnitName>Gaunts</> by 30%.
HagAdeptTrainingUpgrade_Button_desc: Increases the energy regeneration of <UnitName>Hexens</> and allows them to use the <Bold>Venom Trap</> ability.
HagMasterTrainingUpgrade_Button_desc: Further increases the energy regeneration of <UnitName>Hexens</> and allows them to use the <Bold>Miasma</> ability.
WorkerCelestialHarvest_Button_desc: Orders the worker to gather resources from a selected Luminite or Therium node.
Gaunt_Button_desc:
Basic ranged Infernal thrall. Attacks bounce to two nearby targets.

<Yellow>Attack Power:</> <Bold>Low</> (Bonus vs. Light)
<Yellow>Durability:</> <Bold>Very Low</> (Light Armor)
<Yellow>Speed:</> <Bold>Average</> (4 Movement Speed)
Hag_Button_desc:
Infernal caster, adept at Infestation, intelligence, and controlling territory. Can use Skull of Shedda snd Shroudweave.

<Yellow>Attack Power:</> <Bold>Very Low</>
<Yellow>Durability:</> <Bold>Average</> (Light Armor)
<Yellow>Speed:</> <Bold>Average</> (4 Movement Speed)
Weaver_Button_desc:
Disruptive front-line caster. Moves faster on Shroud. Can use Lash, Consume, and Shroudweave.

<Yellow>Attack Power:</> <Bold>Low</>
<Yellow>Durability:</> <Bold>Very High</> (Light Armor)
<Yellow>Speed:</> <Bold>Very Slow</> (2 Movement Speed)

<Purple>Detector</>
RocketCharge_Button_desc:
Launches this unit toward a target location, stopping at the first enemy unit it impacts.

<AttackCallout>Destroys trees in its path.</>
InfernalBuildSubmenu_Button_desc: A list of structures. Building Infernal structures consumes the Imp.
LesserShrine_Button_desc: Primary structure. Used to receive gathered resources. Spread <Bold>Shroud</>.
BarrowFarm_Button_desc: Provides +10 supply. Generates Felhogs that also provide +2 supply and can defend against ground-based attacks.
RitualChamber_Button_desc: Upgrades Imps and Thralls built from the Conclave.
Hellforge_Button_desc: Upgrades Infernal warriors built from the Iron Vault and Infernals faction-wide abilities.
ShadowCleft_Button_desc: Upgrades flyers built from the Twilight Spire.
FlameOn_Button_desc: Enflames this unit, increasing its movement speed and enabling it to explode into enemies at the cost of its health and shortening its lifespan to 4 seconds.
PeakPerformanceUpgrade_Button_desc: Fully powers up the <UnitName>Vulcan's</> weapon after it uses <Bold>Jump Jets</>.
ArtilleryMechDoTUpgrade_Button_desc:
Grants <UnitName>Atlases:</>

<Bold>On-Hit:</> Lights the ground on fire, dealing 20 damage per second to all units for 5 seconds.
SkymineUpgrade_Button_desc: Allows <UnitName>Hornets</> to use the <Bold>Release Skymine</> ability.
OrbitalPlatformAdeptTrainingUpgrade_Butt: Increases the energy regeneration of <UnitName>Sentinels</> and allows them to use the <Bold>Hastebot Dispersal Aura</> passive ability.
OrbitalPlatformMasterTrainingUpgrade_But: Further increases the energy regeneration of <UnitName>Sentinels</> and allows them to use the <Bold>Nano-defense Bubble</> ability.
CovertBombersUpgrade_Button_desc: <Bold>Bombers</> launched from the <UnitName>Helicarrier</> gain permanent Stealth.
SunderSoul_Button_desc:
Rips this unit in half, creating two Fiends in the process, granting them full White Health.

<Bold>Passive:</> If a Brute dies naturally, it will produce two Fiends without White Health.
Brute_Button_desc:
Basic melee Infernal warrior. Spawns 2 Fiends when it perishes, which can swarm the enemy. Can use Sunder Soul.

<Yellow>Attack Power:</> <Bold>Average</>
<Yellow>Durability:</> <Bold>Average</> (Heavy Armor)
<Yellow>Speed:</> <Bold>Average</> (4 Movement Speed)
Magmadon_Button_desc:
Imp riding a heavy melee assault beast adept at mowing down enemy front lines. Can use Trample and Consume.

<Yellow>Attack Power:</> <Bold>Average</>
<Yellow>Durability:</> <Bold>Very High</> (Heavy Armor)
<Yellow>Speed:</> <Bold>Slow</> (3.5 Movement Speed)
PitFiend_Button_desc:
Artillery Infernal with a long-range attack adept at sieging enemy bases.

<Yellow>Attack Power:</> <Bold>Low</> (Bonus vs. Structure)
<Yellow>Durability:</> <Bold>Average</> (Heavy Armor)
<Yellow>Speed:</> <Bold>Slow</> (3.5 Movement Speed)

<AttackCallout>Attacks Trees</>
GhostBlink_Button_desc: Teleports to a nearby target location, turning into a Temporal form. While Temporal, the Vector will take 50% bonus damage from attacks and has the ability to Recall to its original location.
PowerOverload_Button_desc:
Restores 75 health and increases attack speed and damage by 50% for 5 seconds.

<Italic>Right-click to enable/disable autocasting.</>
PowerLeap_Button_desc: Jumps to a target unit or location.
ChronoShift_Button_desc: Amara becomes <Bold>Stealthed</>, leaving behind a ghostly reflection of herself at her current location, and <Bold>Taunting</> nearby enemies for 5 seconds. The reflection wields Thronos and will target any unit she is targeting.
BurningBlade_Button_desc: Adds 100% bonus fire damage to Amara's attacks for 5 seconds.
SeekAndDestroy_Button_desc: Amara teleports to a nearby target location and fully heals herself.
MortalEnd_Button_desc:
Amara spins in a single circle dealing 1000% Basic Attack damage to each enemy unit around her, and Slowing them by 25% for 3 seconds. 
Passive: Nearby enemy Units killed by Amara reduce the Cooldown by 1 second.
ElderShrineMorphWarz_Button_desc:
Upgrades to the Elder Shrine, unlocking more advanced units, structures, and upgrades. 

Enables the <Bold>Devour Souls</> from the Top Bar.

Permanently grants Infernal units 6% <Bold>White Health</> regeneration per second on <Bold>Shroud</>.
ShrineWarzCargoLoad_Button_desc: Load a Fiend into this Shrine
ShrineWarzCargoUnload_Button_desc: Unload all Fiends from this Shrine
MortardonStrike_Button_desc: All of Maloc's Mortardons will fire an Enflamed Imp across the map, each dealing 40 damage in a large area at the target location to both ground and air enemies.
Revitalize_Button_desc: Heals a target unit for 200 health and dispels all negative debuffs on it.
Barclay_HeroicCharge_Button_desc: Leaps towards a target area. On impact, nearby enemy units are dealt 50 damage and stunned for 2 seconds.
HammerTime_Button_desc: Blockade quickly swings his hammer around in circles, gaining 30% bonus movement speed and dealing 120 damage to units around him over 8 seconds.
JusticeJump_Button_desc: Targets a friendly hero or structure. After channeling for 1 second, Blockade and any of his units will teleport to the location of the target.
BarclayRepair_Button_desc: Restores health to mechanical units and structures at an extremely high rate.
GreaterShrineMorphWarz_Button_desc:
Upgrades to the Greater Shrine, unlocking more advanced units, structures, and upgrades. 

Enables the <Bold>Rift Squad</> and <Bold>Infernal Arena</> from the Top Bar.

Permanently grants Infernal units 4% <Bold>White Health</> regeneration per second on <Bold>Shroud</>.
BattleFrenzy_Button_desc: Increases this unit's attack and movement speed by 50% for 10 seconds.
GreaterShrineMorphMaloc_Button_desc:
Upgrades to the Greater Shrine, unlocking more advanced units, structures, and upgrades. 

Enables the <Bold>Felhog Blitz</> and <Bold>Mortardon Strike</> from the Top Bar.

Permanently grants Infernal units 4% <Bold>White Health</> regeneration per second on <Bold>Shroud</>.
FiendMaloch_Button_desc:
Basic Infernal melee unit. Fast but weak.

<Yellow>Attack Power:</> <Bold>Medium</>
<Yellow>Durability:</> <Bold>Very Low</> (Light Armor)
<Yellow>Speed:</> <Bold>Very Fast</> (7 Movement Speed)
RestorationBeam_Button_desc:
Heals a target friendly Biological unit for 20 health per second. While this beam is channeling, other heals have their effectiveness increased by 50% on the target.

<Italic>Right-click to enable/disable autocasting.</>
GuardianSwarm_Button_desc:
Unleashes a swarm of nanobots onto a target unit. If the target is friendly, nearby friendly units gain 50 armor. If the target is an enemy, nearby enemy units gain -50 armor.

<Italic>Right-click to enable/disable autocasting. Automatically casts on friendly units.</>
Invigorate_Button_desc: Restores 30 energy to a target unit and increases its movement speed by 50% for 6 seconds.
AuralannaHealBurst_Button_desc:
Fires a burst of light that heals a friendly unit for 60 health and bounces to two nearby friendly units.

<Italic>Right-click to enable/disable autocasting.</>
AuralannaEnervate_Button_desc:
Links Auralanna with a target enemy unit. Linked unit are dealt 40 damage per second and have 25% reduced movement speed over 6 seconds. Auralanna heals herself for any damage dealt. Multiple beams can be active at the same time.

<Italic>Right-click to enable/disable autocasting.</>
AuralannaResurrectionField_Button_desc: Auralanna channels a gate from the heavens for 5 seconds. Upon completion, all allied corpses in the area are resurrected.
Hush_Button_desc: <Bold>Pacifies</> and <Bold>Silences</> all enemy units in the target area.
BurningBlood_Button_desc: Grants a target unit 25% bonus attack speed and allows it to deal 20 bonus damage on its attacks for 20 seconds.
CinderStorm_Button_desc: Calls down meteors that rain from the sky, dealing 45 damage per meteor.
Wildfire_Button_desc: Summon a temporary fire cyclone that spins towards the target location, dealing 60 damage per second in an area around it.
ServeTheFlame_Button_desc:
Consume the corpses in the target area to summon a Burned One. The more corpses you consume, the larger and stronger the Burned One will become.

You can have up to 5 Burned Ones at the same time.
VoidSunderSoul_Button_desc: Rips this unit in half, spreading Void-Goo while creating two Fiends in the process. The spawned Fiends inherit the Void Goo Vessel trait.
SilentInfiltration_Button_desc: Increases this unit's movement speed and gains <Bold>Stealth</> for 5 seconds.
MassAcceleratorCryoTank_Button_desc: Increases the movement speed of this unit by 200% for 5 seconds. If the Cryo Tank attacks while accelerated, its engines will cool and it will revert back to its base speed.
SelfRepairCryoTank_Button_desc: Channels this unit's core to fully restore its health. The Cryo Tank cannot attack or move while self-repairing and will cease repairs if given another order.
VoidRain_Button_desc: Envelops a target area with acidic rain, removing all positive armor and causing 20 damage a second to all enemy units in the area.
VoidRift_Button_desc: Summons a Void Rift that spawns friendly Shadowflyers every 5 seconds for 30 seconds.
CancelConstruction_Button_desc: Cancel construction of this structure and refund resources.
HQTier2BarclayUpgrade_Button_desc:
Upgrades to the Central Command, unlocking more advanced units, structures, and upgrades. 

Enables the <Bold>Sensor Drone</> and <Bold>Pair-o-Medics</> Orbital Calldowns from the Top Panel.
AuralannaResonanceManifold_Button_desc: Increases construction, production, and research speed by 50%.
BackupPowerShields_Button_desc: When Aurallana is in Red Power, all her structures gain a Shield equal to 25% of its maximum health. Once broken, the Shield will refresh every 60 seconds.
AbyssalCrushingCharge_Button_desc: Charges towards a target, crushing trees in its path. On impact, enemy units and structures will take 30 damage and are stunned for 0.5 seconds.
PillboxCalldown_Button_desc: Instantly constructs a Sentry Post at the target location that lasts for 60 seconds. This structure gains 100% increased attack speed, 100 bonus armor, 100% bonus healing, and +5 vision range.
Fortify_Button_desc: Grants a shield to a target structure that absorbs 1000 damage. Lasts 30 seconds.
Paramedic_Button_desc: Calls down two Para-combat Medics at the target location that last for 60 seconds. Para-combat Medics have 300% bonus healing rate.
LastStandCalldown_Button_desc: Increases the damage of friendly units in a target area by 25% for 20 seconds. When these units take fatal damage, they gain invulnerability for 20 seconds instead.
TemporalReflection_Button_desc: Amara becomes <Bold>Stealthed</>, leaving behind a ghostly reflection of herself at her current location, and <Bold>Taunting</> nearby enemies for 5 seconds. The reflection wields her SMGs and will target any unit she targets.
BurnList_Button_desc: Adds 100% bonus fire damage to Amara's attacks for 5 seconds.
HideAndSeek_Button_desc: Instantly teleports to a nearby target location.
DeathSpiral_Button_desc:
Spins in a circle, dealing 60 damage to enemy units around her and slowing them down by 25% for 3 seconds.

<Bold>Passive:</> Nearby enemy units killed by Amara reduce the cooldown of this ability by 1 second.
HideAndSeekUpgraded_Button_desc: Instantly teleports to a nearby target location.
StasisField_Button_desc: Freezes a target unit or structure in a temporary Stasis Field. Friendly units heal for 10 health per second while Stasised, and Stasis Fields will break after 15 seconds or after taking 750 damage.
VoidLash_Button_desc:
Launches a harpoon at a target unit, pulling it to the location of the Void Weaver. 

If the target is an enemy, deals damage equal to 20% of its health and stuns it for 5 seconds.

If the target is friendly, fully restores both its Health and <Bold>White Health</>.

<Italic>Right-click to enable/disable autocasting on enemies.</>
Net_Button_desc: Net a target enemy flying unit, causing it to fall from the sky, stunning it for 3 seconds.
ReapTheHarvest_Button_desc: Throws the Netherblade towards a target location, dealing 40 damage to enemy ground units along the path. Upon reaching the location, the Netherblade will rotate in place dealing 100 damage per second to nearby enemy ground units. It costs an additional 4 energy per second to maintain the Netherblade.
CallWeaponBack_Button_desc: Calls the Netherblade back to Warz.
InfestNetherblade_Button_desc:
Empowers the Netherblade for 5 seconds, granting Warz 50% increased attack speed and the ability to <Bold>Infest</> attacked enemies.

Every enemy attacked further increases Warz's attack speed by an additional 10%, up to a maximum of 200%.
Darkspeed_Button_desc: Dive towards a nearby location, and gain 50 bonus armor for 4 seconds. If the Netherblade is picked up during the travel, Warz gains an addtional 300 bonus Armor.
InfernalAvatar_Button_desc: Warz becomes an Infernal Avatar for 30 seconds, instantly restoring his health & <Bold>White Health</>, and gaining 20 bonus health for every nearby friendly unit. During this time, his Netherblade deals area damage and gains 25% lifesteal.
MorphToMythiaArcshipTier2_Button_desc:
Upgrades to Mythia Arcstation, unlocking more advanced units, structures, and upgrades.

Enables the <Bold>Evolution Catalyst</> and <Bold>Purify</> Astral Interventions from the Top Panel.

Provides 20 Power.

<Highlight>Surged</>: Gains 50% increased movement speed and energy regeneration.
MorphToMythiaArcshipTier3_Button_desc:
Upgrades to the Arcfortress, unlocking the pinnacle of Celestial units, structures, and upgrades. Increases energy regeneration and enables the Fate's End ability.

Enables the <Bold>Summon Aeon Gate</> Astral Intervention from the Top Panel.

Provides 20 Power.

<Highlight>Surged</>: Gains 50% increased movement speed and energy regeneration.
Chimera_Button_desc:
Anti-air flyer that deals heavy area damage.

<Yellow>Attack Power:</> <Bold>High</>
<Yellow>Durability:</> <Bold>High</> (Heavy Armor)
<Yellow>Speed:</> <Bold>Fast</> (5 Movement Speed)
